comment.text: This translation key is used to display an error message when SSO authentication fails. It appears as a generic error message and may be used in UI elements such as login buttons or dialogs, indicating that an authentication attempt was unsuccessful due to SSO-related issues.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'İdentifikasiya uğursuz oldu' is a literal translation of 'Authentication failed', it's not the most natural or commonly used phrasing in Azerbaijani. 'Authentication' typically implies a more complex process than simply 'identification'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Təsdiq uğursuz oldu' or 'Daxilolma uğursuz oldu' which more accurately reflect the meaning of 'Authentication failed'. 'Daxilolma' specifically refers to logging in or accessing a system.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຕົວວຕົນ' appears to be a typo and likely intended to be 'ຕົວຕົນ' (person).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການພິສູດຢືນຢັນຕົວຕົນລົ້ມເຫລວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ການພິສູດຢືນຢັນຕົວຕົນລົ້ມເຫລວ' is understandable, a more natural and commonly used translation for 'Authentication failed' might be 'ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບລົ້ມເຫລວ' or 'ການຢັ້ງຢືນຕົວຕົນບໍ່ສໍາເລັດ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບລົ້ມເຫລວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation "බලය දීමට අසමත් විය" (balaya dimito asamat viya) literally translates to 'failed to give power' which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Authentication failed'.  It implies a transfer of power, not a failure to verify credentials.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සාudaraauthentication අසාර්ථක විය (saudara authentication asarthaka viya) - This translates to 'Authentication was unsuccessful' or “Authentication failed” more directly. Alternatively, අවසර ලබා ගැනීමට නොහැකි විය (awasawa laba gatukama naki viya) - which means 'unable to get permission'.
